headline.sub: Guantanamo hearing halted after defense claim FBI spying
headline.main: Guantanamo hearing halted after defense claim FBI spying

docs.snippet: A military hearing for five men accused of conspiring in the 9/11 attacks concludes early amid concerns that defense attorneys were being probed by the FBI. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A military hearing for five men accused of conspiring in the 9/11 attacks concludes early amid concerns that defense attorneys were being probed by the FBI. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.print_headline: Turkey Twitter Accounts Appear Blocked After Erdogan Court Action
headline.main: Turkey Twitter Accounts Appear Blocked After Erdogan Court Action

docs.snippet: Two anonymous Twitter accounts used to release secretly recorded conversations implicating family and associates of Turkey's prime minister and senior government officials in a corruption scandal appeared on Sunday to have been blocked....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two anonymous Twitter accounts used to release secretly recorded conversations implicating family and associates of Turkey's prime minister and senior government officials in a corruption scandal appeared on Sunday to have been blocked.

headline.print_headline: Part of Fla. History to Step Back Into Spotlight
headline.main: Part of Fla. History to Step Back Into Spotlight

docs.snippet: Hidden behind live oaks and magnolias near the Florida Governor's Mansion, a historic house that symbolizes much of the state's terrible past and transformation will soon have its doors opened to the public....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hidden behind live oaks and magnolias near the Florida Governor's Mansion, a historic house that symbolizes much of the state's terrible past and transformation will soon have its doors opened to the public.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Fights Back to Beat Federer in Monte Carlo Final
headline.main: Wawrinka Fights Back to Beat Federer in Monte Carlo Final

docs.snippet: Stanislas Wawrinka signaled his French Open ambitions by beating Roger Federer 4-6 7-6 (5) 6-2 in an all-Swiss Monte Carlo Masters final on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stanislas Wawrinka signaled his French Open ambitions by beating Roger Federer 4-6 7-6 (5) 6-2 in an all-Swiss Monte Carlo Masters final on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Vekic Beats Cibulkova for 1st WTA Title
headline.main: Vekic Beats Cibulkova for 1st WTA Title

docs.snippet: Seventh-seeded Donna Vekic of Croatia clinched her first WTA title on Sunday after beating top-seeded Dominika Cibulkova of Slovakia 5-7, 7-5, 7-6 (4) in the Malaysian Open final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seventh-seeded Donna Vekic of Croatia clinched her first WTA title on Sunday after beating top-seeded Dominika Cibulkova of Slovakia 5-7, 7-5, 7-6 (4) in the Malaysian Open final.

headline.print_headline: Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, U.S. Boxer Famous in Folk Song, Dies at 76
headline.main: Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, U.S. Boxer Famous in Folk Song, Dies at 76

docs.snippet: Former U.S. professional boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who spent 19 years in prison for murder and then was released after it was determined he did not get a fair trial, died on Sunday at the age of 76, according to his friend and caretaker John...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former U.S. professional boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who spent 19 years in prison for murder and then was released after it was determined he did not get a fair trial, died on Sunday at the age of 76, according to his friend and caretaker John Artis.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Beats Federer to Win Monte Carlo Masters
headline.main: Wawrinka Beats Federer to Win Monte Carlo Masters

docs.snippet: Stanislas Wawrinka showed that his first Grand Slam title wasn't a fluke, upstaging his more illustrious countryman to add a maiden Masters trophy in Monte Carlo on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stanislas Wawrinka showed that his first Grand Slam title wasn't a fluke, upstaging his more illustrious countryman to add a maiden Masters trophy in Monte Carlo on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Woman Reunited With Dog, TV Snatched on 1st Date
headline.main: Woman Reunited With Dog, TV Snatched on 1st Date

docs.snippet: A woman has been reunited with her Yorkshire Terrier and flat-screen TV that were snatched during her first date with a man she met online....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman has been reunited with her Yorkshire Terrier and flat-screen TV that were snatched during her first date with a man she met online.

headline.print_headline: Chinese Admiral to Snub Japan at Regional Meeting: Xinhua
headline.main: Chinese Admiral to Snub Japan at Regional Meeting: Xinhua

docs.snippet: The commander of the Chinese navy will refuse to meet Japanese military officials one-on-one at a regional naval symposium in China this week, a navy spokesman was quoted as saying on Sunday, citing what he called hurtful actions by Japanese leade...
docs.lead_paragraph: The commander of the Chinese navy will refuse to meet Japanese military officials one-on-one at a regional naval symposium in China this week, a navy spokesman was quoted as saying on Sunday, citing what he called hurtful actions by Japanese leaders.

headline.print_headline: In West Bank, Teen Offenders Face Different Fates
headline.main: In West Bank, Teen Offenders Face Different Fates

docs.snippet: The boys were both 15, with the crackly voices and awkward peach fuzz of adolescence. They lived just a few minutes away from one another in the West Bank. And both were accused of throwing stones at vehicles, one day after the other....
docs.lead_paragraph: The boys were both 15, with the crackly voices and awkward peach fuzz of adolescence. They lived just a few minutes away from one another in the West Bank. And both were accused of throwing stones at vehicles, one day after the other.
